# Chaos Totem, Greater (Su)
## Overview
*Chaos Totem, Greater (Su)*: While raging, the barbarian gains DR/lawful equal to 1/2 her barbarian level. Her weapons and natural weapons are considered chaotic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. A barbarian must have the [[Chaos Totem (Su)|chaos totem]] rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 74
